title: Swept Away
description: In this Dateline classic, two young people from opposite sides of the world find themselves falling in love on the eve of one of the biggest natural disasters in recent memory. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 27, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
